item.title: Pin down data breach with email aliases
item.description: A long time ago I stumbled upon interesting gmail feature - trivial way to create email aliases by using “+” character support.google.com/a/users/answer/9308648 . Since then, every time I needed to sign in somewhere, I used account-specific email address. For example my.email+imdb@example.com. Years passed and I didn’t notice any outcome of this approach. I even started questioning value of this practice. But just recently I observed something unusual. Higher number of spam emails.
